page.title: 09WINCHCOMBE ROAD NURSERIES
page.content: In Winchcombe Road there is a large nursery with many glasshouses. The whole area of the nursery covers approx 3\ acres. Over 1\ acres is covered in glasshouses. The nursery supplies the markets in Pershore and Cheltenham. The glasshouses are heated by oil fired heating. In the summer the nursery which is owned by Mr Andrews grows tomatoes and cucumbers. In the winter most of the glasshouses are used to grow lettuces and spring onions. During the summer Mr Andrews has about 7 staff helping with produce but not necessarily all at one time. Mr Andrews' family have owned the nursery for the last 22 years.
